name: learning-electronjs
description: This is a sample project with ALL of the following: ElectronJS, ReactJS, and TypeScript.
author: Carlos DaLomba

scripts.start: concurrently -k "cross-env BROWSER=none npm run start-react" "npm run transpile && wait-on tcp:3000 && npm run start-electron-without-tsc"
scripts.build-windows: npm run build-react && npm run build-electron-windows
scripts.build-mac: npm run build-react && npm run build-electron-mac
scripts.build-linux: npm run build-react && npm run build-electron-linux
scripts.start-electron: npm run transpile && npm run start-electron-without-tsc
scripts.build-electron-windows: npm run transpile && electron-builder build --win -c.extraMetadata.main=build/electron/main.js --publish never
scripts.build-electron-mac: npm run transpile && electron-builder build --mac -c.extraMetadata.main=build/electron/main.js --publish never
scripts.build-electron-linux: npm run transpile && electron-builder build --linux -c.extraMetadata.main=build/electron/main.js --publish never
